original_text: So Jeremiah wrote in a book all the evil that should come upon Babylon, even all these words that are written against Babylon.
korean_text: 예레미야가 바벨론에 닥칠 모든 재난 곧 바벨론에 대하여 기록한 이 모든 말씀을 한 책에 기록하고

sentences.original_text: So Jeremiah wrote in a book
all the evil that should come upon Babylon
